Notes beta and Notes v1 vs Talko icon. @BenedictEvans @talkoteam http://t.co/N0zEhQK97a
Such an amazing time for us as developers: "It‚Äôs hard to express just how much of a change this is" @BenedictEvans http://t.co/eC7RRF5SrS
22/Mitch,Tim,Len,Iris,Lotus,IBM,Partners& you who've used our work, THANK YOU for the opp‚Äôy afforded us. Happy anniv! http://t.co/cetVxy8ZB1
21/From Notes to @talkoteam I've been so fortunate: such amazing teams; such amazing apps. http://t.co/Zcjy1Q8pYG http://t.co/iSm2Br0cBO
20/By ‚Äô97 v4.5, Lotus buys Iris & IBM buys Lotus. ~125M paid users @ ~$99-$249 ea.; ~$9 to ecosys per $1 we earned. http://t.co/RiSJU1LeqP
19/By ‚Äô93 w/ v3 we hit inflection! Value clear. LANs finally common. MSExchange appears & suddenly it's a MARKET! http://t.co/dlmAKbFJPg
18/Struggled to get traction; shipped v2 ‚Äò91 & stayed alive THANKS TO BELIEVERS eg @sheldonlaube @mcuban & many more http://t.co/eYSeJ0uLbU
17/Ugh; slog. Req‚Äôd appdev/mgmt features. Legal tussles. Win&OS2 cli&svrs. Nearly killed us. But SHIPPED on 12/7/89. http://t.co/aonJT62Gtv
16/Win server, bizarrely with USER/GDI unloaded to recover memory. (We modded Win sources; MSFT accepted changes.) http://t.co/nukstKTF50
15/Data was either local or server-based, accessed/replicated over LAN - or modem via X.PC modded for our env. http://t.co/v3Hu6fn8zo
14/We stress-tested by using our own apps for project mgmt. More and more complex views, forms, fields, functions. http://t.co/Jm9wCZmQxx
13/Looking at these old news stories is such a blast‚Ä¶ http://t.co/PrEWwdxGuw
12/User-created apps. Pure functional form/view language. Integrations, like this one w/Compuserve for News. http://t.co/akaN6sCDCH
11/User-customized forms/views to suit apps‚Äô needs. (BTW we had to impl our own overlapping win mgr on Win v1.) http://t.co/852k6FAj97
10/Threaded discussions were ‚Äòjust an app‚Äô. Supported either 2-level or full outline-style reply hierarchies. http://t.co/XrLUuVYk2U
9/Directory was ‚Äòjust an app‚Äô. Address book had addrs, photos, pubkeys for people & servers, certs for orgs. http://t.co/GvxKMDJLag
8/Form based mail. Link, disk, AND end-to-end msg encr; RSA/DES (@RonRivest developed RC4 to unblock our US export!) http://t.co/cgBm18Qtyd
7/Mail was ‚Äòjust an app‚Äô. We ate our own cooking, but Lotus largely VAX so we built VMS & MCI mail gateways. http://t.co/VPSEsRsqfX
6/Achieved MVP, workgroup-scale: nosql DB, forms/docs/views, IDE, richtext, client/server, replication, mail, secure. http://t.co/CgocN24KWP
5/Spent ~30% dev calories fighting memory constraints! After 15 months, beta deployed at our close partner Lotus. http://t.co/DkTanJoGSB
4/@billgates convinced me to bet on pre-rel Windows. But wanted icon/desktop UX, so had to build it at app level. http://t.co/olqByCEGAd
3/Used Mac; tuned up pitch. Closed deal & founded Iris on 12/7/84 w/ @lenkawell & @timhalvorsen. Coded like mad! http://t.co/6bkJQn9aDO
2/In July ‚Äô84 I pitched an mail/collab app to @mkapor. He liked the concept .. but its char mode UI not so much. http://t.co/JlYutFrEmO
1/This Sunday, Dec 7, is the 25th anniv of Lotus Notes AND the 30th of my startup Iris! A brief story, in 22 tweets. http://t.co/Q96GsgVLQd
